      • onPackageEvent

        void onPackageEvent​(int eventCode,
                    java.lang.String msg,
                    JAppInfo info)
        install/uninstall 
        

        

        Parameter:
        

        eventCode - install/uninstall result
     public static final int EVENT_INSTALL_SUCCESS = 0;           //Installation successful
     public static final int EVENT_INSTALL_FAIL_PACKAGE_ERROR = 1;//There is an issue with the installation package
     public static final int EVENT_INSTALL_FAIL_VERSION_LOW = 2;  //The installation version is lower than the current version
     public static final int EVENT_INSTALL_FAIL_PATH_ERROR = 3;   //There is an issue with the installation package path
     public static final int EVENT_UNINSTALL_SUCCESS = 10;        //Uninstalling successful
     public static final int EVENT_UNINSTALL_FAIL_OTHER = 12;     //Other issues with uninstallation
     public static final int EVENT_UNINSTALL_NO_EXIST = 13;       //The current application does not exist
 
                        
        
                        
        msg - path of apk, package name of app when install/uninstall fail
        
                        
        info - app of info when install/uninstall successJAppInfo array
